location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:173 x 153 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘36’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a narrow street in Baghdad. A man leads a donkey bearing a woman towards the camera at centre, while groups of people stand at either side of the alleyway and in the distant background. The buildings on either side of the street are made of brick and feature projecting mashrabiyyas of wood and metal.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'View in Bagdad.'Pencil, alongside image at upper right: ‘36’; ‘14’
